original_text: Now this is why he did so: All those who came out of Egypt—all the men of military age—died in the wilderness on the way after leaving Egypt.
korean_text: 여호수아가 할례를 시행한 까닭은 이것이니 애굽에서 나온 모든 백성 중 남자 곧 모든 군사는 애굽에서 나온 후 광야 길에서 죽었는데

sentences.original_text: Now this is why he did so
All those who came out of Egypt
all the men of military age
on the way after leaving Egypt
